attributes.action: Save the people of Myanmar from their Military.
attributes.additional_details:
Innocent people are dying why aren’t people with power making a difference and helping. How many more innocent lives must be taken?

Furthermore, This is not being discussed by anyone or any country enough and is being brushed aside. Why are we allowing this to happen? We say the world is evolving but until we all equal nothing has changed...
attributes.background: I want you to speak on this matter and do something about the situation in Myanmar, people are dying every day... children are dying every day. They are not being helped and therefore innocent people are dying protect them fight for Myanmar’s democracy.

rejection.details:
Impose sanctions on Myanmar due to the military coup. 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573943

Urge the UN to intervene in Myanmar with a peace keeping force 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577765
